devfestahm24-announced.brief: It is official. GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024 is going to take place in Ahmedabad, 24th November 2024.
devfestahm24-announced.content:
**GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024 – The Biggest Developer Gathering is Here!**

Get ready, Ahmedabad! GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024 is just around the corner, happening on **November 24th, 2024.** This year’s event is set to be our **biggest and best yet**, marking the **10th season** of [#DevFestAhm](https://twitter.com/search?q=DevFestAhm) from the **[Google Developer Group of Ahmedabad (GDG Ahmedabad)](http://www.gdgahmedabad.com/).** We couldn’t be more excited to bring together the local developer community for a day of learning, collaboration, and innovation.

DevFest is the annual gathering of tech enthusiasts, developers, entrepreneurs, and innovators hosted by **Google Developers Group Ahmedabad (GDG Ahmedabad).** It’s a place for everyone to explore the latest in technology, learn from industry experts, and connect with fellow developers. Whether you’re passionate about Android, Web, Cloud, or any of Google’s cutting-edge technologies, DevFest is for you.

DevFest is an annual event where developers, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts come together to explore cutting-edge technologies and share knowledge. From **Android** and **Web development** to **Cloud** and **AI**, DevFest is designed to connect people with Google’s latest tech advancements.

What to Expect at GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024

GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024 is going to be bigger and better than ever before. Here’s what you can look forward to:
  • **30+ expert-led sessions** covering the most in-demand topics, including **Generative AI, Vertex AI, Google Cloud, Web Technologies, Startup Ecosystem,** and much more.
  • An opportunity to network with **1,500+ developers, engineers, managers, and entrepreneurs** from diverse industries, offering unparalleled collaboration and learning opportunities.
  • **Hands-on workshops** to immerse yourself in the latest technologies, gain practical skills, and solve real-world problems.
  • Explore trending areas like **Flutter, Kotlin, Machine Learning, Blockchain**, and **ARCore** through **tech showcases** and demos.

Whether you're looking to enhance your skills, get inspired by industry leaders, or simply connect with other tech enthusiasts, GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024 offers something for everyone. The event promises a vibrant atmosphere filled with opportunities to learn, grow, and share ideas.

Ahmedabad is fast emerging as a hub for technology in Gujarat, and DevFest plays a crucial role in fueling that momentum. It’s not just an event—it’s a community gathering that brings together the brightest tech minds in the region.

Ticket Information

Stay tuned for **ticket details**, which will be announced soon. Don't miss your chance to be part of this incredible event!.
Tickets - Declare soon

We’re excited for what’s coming and we want to keep you in the loop! Be sure to **[join us on GDG Ahmedabad platform](https://gdg.community.dev/gdg-ahmedabad)** or follow us on **[Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/GDG-Ahmedabad)**, **[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/gdg-ahmedabad/), [X/Twitter](https://twitter.com/GDGAhmedabad/)**, and **[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/gdg_ahmedabad)** to stay updated on all the latest news, speaker announcements, and event details.

Join us on **November 24th, 2024**, for a day packed with learning, collaboration, and fun! We can’t wait to see you at **[#DevFestAhm](https://twitter.com/search?q=DevFestAhm) 2024.**

- The GDG DevFest Ahmedabad Team
devfestahm24-announced.title: Announcing GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024

c4p.brief: GDG DevFest Ahmedabad was announced, for the tenth year in a row, the conference will bring together 1500+ developers, managers and...
c4p.content:
**PLEASE READ THE GIVEN INSTRUCTIONS with Focus and Attention**

We are back to rock our 10th DevFest season. Yeah! you have heard it right, we hosted our very 1st DevFest event back in 2013. Before going ahead, we want you to check out the last offline DevFest Ahmedabad event, which would help you in realising the level of quality, knowledge and impact that we are expecting from each speaker.



GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2024 has been announced! The 10th edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Ahmedabad will take place on **24th November 2024** in the Heritage city of India.

That means that it is time to open the Call For Speaker form. If you are passionate about your work and want to share your experience with the biggest tech audience in Ahmedabad, you knock on the right door.

Last year DevFest broke all expectations of the audience, speakers, and even our ones. With 95% of satisfied attendees, we can claim that GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2022 was a great success.

To keep up this year, we decided to focus on the content. We’re looking for speakers like you, who are ready to rock the stage and deliver the best talk or workshop in the field.

## Target Audience

The majority of our target audience will be IT professionals (Web/Mobile/Backend Developers / Designers / ML Engineers / Data Scientists / Entrepreneurs and Startup ecosystem enablers, etc.) from 0 to 20 years of experience. We would also welcome students and freshers, only if they have hands-on knowledge on technologies!

## Session Format

- Session - 30 to 45 mins talk, detailed talk on any of the topics mentioned below.
- Lightening
- 10 to 15 mins talk, quick overview on any of the topics mentioned below.
- Keynote - 30 to 45 mins talk

## Session Topics

We will accept talks for our planned tracks such as,

**Web / AI ML / Cloud**

- Web Development, topics not limited to
- Angular
- Firebase
- PWA
- Chrome Developer Tools
- Performance
- Accessibility
- TensorFlow JS
- JavaScript
- Modern Web App Capabilities
- UI / UX Trends
- Blockchain
- NFT
- Web3 development etc.
- AI ML, topics not limited to
- TensorFlow
- Vertex AI
- AutoML
- Dataflow
- Firebase
- ML Kit
- Cloud Natural Language etc.
- Cloud, topics not limited to
- Google Kubernetes Engine
- Compute Engine
- Cloud Storage
- Big Query
- Cloud Functions etc.

**Android / Flutter Development**

- Android/Flutter Development, topics not limited to:
- Flutter/Android scalable architecture best practices
- Kotlin Multiplatform and Flutter, Code for one and generate for multiple platforms
- Optimize your apps for Android Go edition
- Generating apps in no time using No-code or Pro-code platforms
- Adaptive layout and latest UI/UX design trends in Android and Flutter
- Start-up & Emerging Technologies
- Start-up and Emerging Technologies, topics not limited to:
- Preparing pitch deck for tech startups
- Raising funds for the technical products and tech startups
- Products demo showcasing technology implementation and how you have solved real-world problems and developed solutions
- Emerging Technologies like EV Charging, Blockchain, etc.
- Why Startups Fail
- Key Insights on building a startup

**MOST IMPORTANT Expectation from CFPs this year**

This year we are looking for the values and experienced based Talk proposals, wherein you have implemented some practices in your product(s) and you have achieved some users growth, revenue growth, code scalability achieved, generated funding, build MVP with solid principles and practices, etc.

This year we are not expecting talks on topics like Getting started with something or beginner level which one can do search over web and find out easily, like “Getting started with flutter development”, “How to implement in MVVM in Android”, “Getting started with JavaScript technologies”, etc.

**DOs of CFP**

- Please elaborate the topic in a proper way to help understand and review your talk.
- Please submit details about your past talk(s).
- Please include links of your past talk(s) presentations, videos etc.
- Please mention key takeaways of your talks and how it will benefit the developers.

**DON'T of CFP**

- Pitching and marketing of the product or company. Speaker can mention the company name but the focus of the talk should be technology.
- The talk should be the original idea of the speaker and should not be copied over from someone.
- The topic should be relevant for the audience and should not be in the practice in recent years.
- Avoid talks like getting started or hello world.

## Why is it cool to be a speaker?

Well, do you know a better way to attend the conference? Here are our top 3 reasons to submit a proposal.

1️⃣ It is good for your career. By being a speaker, you are proving your level of expertise to potential business partners or employers.
2️⃣ It is good for the company you’re working for. Any presentation delivered by an employee adds credibility to a company’s public image.
3️⃣ Unique networking. Being a speaker means you’ll have a unique chance to network with other speakers - the best experts in the industry.

## Perks of being speaker at DevFestAhm

- Full day access to the conference
- Chance of networking with 1500+ developers in the conference

- Exposure to community members on official GDG Ahmedabad social media accounts

- Help from GDG Ahmedabad team members in talk preparation.

**Call for Speakers will stay open until October 31, 2024. Don’t miss out :)**

**Please note:** There is no guarantee that a submission will be put onto the conference agenda! The program committee picks the most interesting talk proposals and informs the selected submitters max by 31st October, 2024.

Any questions? Email any organisers at [pareshmayani@gmail.com](mailto:pareshmayani@gmail.com) OR [hdave10@gmail.com](mailto:hdave10@gmail.com) OR [jdpatel.android@gmail.com](mailto:jdpatel.android@gmail.com).

Submit a proposal
c4p.title: We're looking for speakers

101.description:
- What, Why and Why Not of AI 
- Good, Bad and Ugly of AI 
- What if Your Future 

- Gen AI and Infinite Possibilities 
- What not to do with AI 
- What AI should do for Mankind 

- Let Me Predict the Future 
- There is life beyond AI
101.title: Focus on Future Keynote

102.description:
This session explores how Built-in Chrome AI leverages the Gemini Nano model to bring powerful AI features directly to your browser and how you can integrate these features into your web applications. 
We'll demystify Chrome's AI APIs, including: 
* Prompt API 
* Summarizer API 
* Writer and Rewriter API 
* Translation API 
* Language Detection API 

 Why this talk is important: 
This session provides a foundational understanding of how AI is rapidly changing the web landscape. Chrome's built-in AI empowers developers to create intelligent, user-friendly experiences with enhanced privacy and performance. 
What participants will benefit: 
* Understand the core concepts of Chrome's built-in AI. 
* Learn to use Chrome's AI APIs effectively. 
* Understand benefits of local AI processing 
* Discover practical applications of AI in web development. 
Technologies used: 
* Chrome Browser 
* JavaScript 
* Built-in Chrome AI APIs 
Target audience: 
Beginner and intermediate web developers.
102.title: Chrome Built-in AI : Powerful AI features directly in your browser

103.description: The talk will emphasize the critical need for developers to embrace the rapidly evolving GenAI technologies to stay relevant in the dynamic tech landscape. The talk will highlight strategies for integrating GenAI into existing development workflows, addressing the challenges and opportunities it presents, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation to leverage the full potential of GenAI in the development sector.
103.title: Innovate or Stagnate: Adapting to the GenAI Era in Development

vishal_virani.bio:
Vishal, with 11+ years of entrepreneurial expertise, currently shines as the Co-Founder and CEO of DhiWise, a revolutionary procode platform designed to elevate developers' work beyond mundane tasks. His journey in the tech world began with the founding of Coruscate Solutions, where under his leadership, the company expanded its reach across 24 countries in various sectors. 

As a computer engineering graduate, Vishal's experiences have been pivotal in shaping DhiWise, with a focus on streamlining and enhancing developer productivity. Apart from his professional pursuits, Vishal is passionate about design and travel. He is often involved in creative design projects, bringing unique ideas to life in both office and home settings. As an avid traveler, he has an ambitious goal of visiting 40 countries before his 40th birthday. Vishal's leadership at DhiWise is not just about technological innovation but also about inspiring others to balance professional success with personal interests and aspirations.

kapil_bakshi.bio:
Kapil Bakshi is a very passionate techie with an aim to embrace technology, imbibe every bit of it, transcend all the barriers and turn ideas into reality. His experience spans across edtech, fintech and logistics sectors where he has developed things from scratch taking them to a level where they have scaled drastically and have become a brand in their respective domains. 

He is currently working at BlackBuck which is redefining the logistics landscape of India, making it reliable and efficient. Kapil is playing an important role there to improve quality of all apps, doing optimisations and helping the company scale to go much beyond. 

Apart from Android, he has worked on Backend technologies as well and many times single-handedly built complex features which have proven to be very beneficial for business. 

In Android, his areas of interest include testing, architectural best practices and security. 

Kapil has also given talks on architectural best practices and testing and has been invited at International Conferences like Droidcon Beijing 2017 .

prajyot_mainkar.bio: Prajyot Mainkar is the director of Androcid - A Mobile engineering development company based out of Goa and one of the winner's of Goa State CM Startup Award. He has been associated with Hon. PM Shri. Narendra Modi's PMO initiative of MYGOV. In mentoring more than 50 startups under the PMO initiative. Recipient of the Young Entrepreneur of the year by Business Goa and one of the 14 Intel innovators in the country, Prajyot has delivered more than 350 talks across the globe of which the prominent have been Droidcon Greece, Android Developer Days in Turkey, Google developer summit, Sri Lanka. Yourstory, one of India's leading startup brand recognized him as the Android man of Goa and was also featured as top techies in India in 2015. He is the technical advisor to India's one of the leading Digital Incubator For Students - The Startup Village and also several other incubators. Recently, became the first Goan author to publish a book on Mobile Technology called - Expert Android Programming, which is circulated in UK, India, Sri Lanka, Nepal, and Bangladesh. Post that, published another book on Flutter. He is also on the board of EDC Ignite as an advisor and industry advisor to Goa Stage IT policy.GEMS(Goa entrepreneur mentoring service) recently awarded him The trailblazer excellence award for contribution of IT in Goa.
prajyot_mainkar.name: Prajyot Mainkar

2019.title: Keynote - Don't Build a Startup, Build a Culture

He is a Google Developer Expert for Google Cloud Platform and actively manages Google Cloud Developers Community, Mumbai. He speaks at various conferences and mentors Students, Young Professionals as well as local businesses on Cloud Technologies using the Google Cloud Platform and Open Source technologies. She is currently exploring the field of computer vision. She is fascinated with Operating Systems and has worked with the Linux kernel as an Outreachy intern. During her internship, she has worked on improving the Linux kernel support for running as a guest on Microsoft's hypervisor Hyper-V with larger page sizes on ARM64 architecture. When she is not glued to the computer screen, she reads motivational and philosophical literature, practices Karate and plays her guitar.

He has authored two books, "Hands-on Python Deep Learning for Web" and "Mobile Deep Learning with TensorFlow Lite, ML Kit and Flutter". He's also a Google Venkat Panchapakesan Memorial Scholar. Anubhav has been a contributor to several open-source projects and was a Google Summer of Code participant in 2019. He also leads the team at GDG Cloud Kolkata. You will often find him talking about System architecture, Machine Learning and the web.

dhananjay_kumar.bio:
Dhananjay Kumar is a teacher, published author, and creator of one of the world's largest Angular/JavaScript communities ng-India. Dhananjay Kumar is a consultant and well-known trainer with around 750 Hrs of experience of teaching Angular and overall approximately 2000 Hrs to students from various backgrounds. 

Dhananjay's clientele includes but not limited to Aristocrat, NRI, Bethel, Times Now, Accenture, Acheron, AIS, and Kovai.co, etc. 

Dhananjay is a prolific tech writer with around 1000 articles in his credit, exemplary speaker with about 75 talks, and author of the best-selling book, Angular Essentials. For his contributions to the developer community, he is awarded Microsoft Most Valuable Professional Award 10 times and recognized as a Developer Expert in Angular by Google. 

Dhananjay is also the founder of geek97, which enables developers to be job-ready, and organizes India’s Largest Angular Conference, ng-India. 

Dhananjay is known for his unique way of teaching, in which he solely relies on writing code with visualization to explain a certain topic. As of now he is teaching and doing consulting on JavaScript, Angular Azure, NodeJS, dotnetcore , microservices #tdd, etc.

harsh_goyal.bio:
Harsh is a B.Tech graduate in Information Technology, with more than 3 years of data scientist experience. His expertise spans machine learning, computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), and Large Language Models (LLMs). Proficient in Python, cloud platforms, and API development, he's adept at leading teams to project success, fueled by his passion for cutting-edge AI technologies like Hugging Face Transformers, ChatGPT OpenAI Third Party API Integrations, and the development of LangChain for advanced LLM applications. 

At ThinkBridge, Harsh spearheaded the development of a product roadmap tool utilizing LLM, excelling in prompt engineering, tuning, and fine-tuning. During his tenure at SculptSoft, he crafted an efficient Python backend server, optimized 3D reconstruction models, and mastered advanced technologies. As a Machine Learning Engineer at Teksun Microsys, he deployed predictive models and enhanced skeleton detection on Android.
harsh_goyal.name: Harsh Goyal

2023.title: Leveraging the Power of Large Language Models (LLMs)

harsh_goyal.title: ThinkBridge, Senior Data Scientist

shivam_joshi.bio: Shivam Joshi, a young tech wizard is an entrepreneur, founder and executive director at Codon's Ltd. as well as a Corporate trainer. This individual is India's youngest corporate trainer for Artificial Intelligence. He started his entrepreneurial journey at the mere age of 18. Building Codon's from scratch within a span of years, he scaled up. Shivam has always been of the strong opinion that marks and grades are just an overviewing factor but it cannot define one's worth. Shivam's clientele includes renowned companies like LTI, Infosys, HCL, Wipro, TCS and many more. Along with a continuously increasing list of remarkable achievements, he has featured in a number of publishers which include Outlook India, Asian Age, Business World, The Hitavada. Shivam Joshi's achievements are winning gold rank for Innovation in Dubai Expo, Board member of IEEE Rising Stars USA, Head Indian Delegation at AISEEF Jakarta, Represented India at Thailand for Automatic Parking Resolver.

priyanka_vergadia.bio: Priyanka Vergadia leads Developer Advocacy at Google and is the author of the #1 best selling book “Visualizing Google Cloud”. She specializes in the breadth of Google Cloud and putting together solutions that span across different cloud tools including Generative AI. You might recognize her from the Google Cloud Tech YouTube channel. She builds highly engaging and uniquely visual content for developers and technical practitioners. She has created more than 500 pieces of content across videos, blogs and tutorials. She is one of the top visual storytellers with 100K+ followers across social media platforms. She marries her artist skills with the technical expertise to create sketches for folks to learn from. She is an author who has combined her technical knowledge with visual storytelling into her book 'Visualizing Google Cloud'. You can also find her video on Cloud concepts on her Youtube channel The Cloud Girl and her website thecloudgirl.dev. Priyanka Vergadia is also a lecturer at University of Pennsylvania where she teaches a Cloud Computing course.
priyanka_vergadia.name: Priyanka Vergadia

2023.title: How to prepare for the world of GenAI

priyanka_vergadia.title: Head of North America Developer Advocacy

raza_noorani.bio:
Known for giving folks the best technical advice in town, Raza is the CEO & founder of Impero IT Services, an Ahmedabad based app development boutique! 
Working with some incredible group of people at Impero, Raza and his tech squad are on the voyage to create exceptional softwares that help people worldwide do more exciting things efficiently & faster! 
Impero stands honored with the esteemed 'Certificate of Excellence' from the Indian Army. Their apps consistently dominate industry charts, including one adopted by Google. Noteworthy accolades include mentorship from the Melinda & Bill Gates Foundation, a recognition as a Top Startup at the International Web Summit by Werner Vogels, Amazon's CTO. Seven apps developed by Impero have secured funding, and a standout startup app was acquired by Concentrix, a Fortune 500 company. 
Impero has garnered attention in Forbes for delivering exceptional and magnificent solutions, contributing to the success of numerous outstanding ideas. What sets Impero apart is its unique software outsourcing model, boasting a physical presence in Europe, the Americas, Africa, and Asia. 
In addition to steering Impero with remarkable leadership, Raza is passionate about delivering motivational speeches. Beyond the tech realm, he finds joy in exploring different corners of the world and indulging in diverse culinary experiences.
raza_noorani.name: Raza Noorani

2023.title: From Vision To Victory: Tips and Tales

raza_noorani.title: CEO & Founder
